title: Ep. 39: 'GoT,' Chance the Rapper, and Tom Hiddleston's Niche
description:
Chris and Andy share their thoughts on last night's 'Game of Thrones,' Chance the Rapper's 'Coloring Book' (23:00), Tom Hiddleston's chances of becoming the new Bond (44:00), and 'Steve Jobs' (2015). 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
